description: Audit history information for BMT donor selection, suitability, and availability information.

columns.name: EPISODE_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the episode record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: SUITABILITY_C_NAME
columns.description:
Donor suitability audit item


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Suitable


Unsuitable

columns.name: AVAILABILITY_C_NAME
columns.description:
Donor availability audit item


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Available


Unavailable


Temporarily Unavailable

columns.name: SELECTION_C_NAME
columns.description:
Donor selection audit item


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Selected for Donation


Deferred

columns.name: UPDATE_USER_ID
columns.description: Donor suitability and selection audit user

columns.name: START_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: Donor suitability and selection audit instant

columns.name: END_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: The end instant for a given set of donor suitability, availability, and selection values

columns.name: DNR_WRKP_AUD_C_NAME
columns.description:
Donor workup audit item


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Primary


Backup
